snippet: Part of an advertising campaign for Popchips snacks featuring Ashton Kutcher has been withdrawn amid complaints that Mr. Kutcher's performance as an Indian named Raj was racist.
abstract: Part of an advertising campaign for Popchips snacks featuring Ashton Kutcher has been withdrawn amid complaints that Mr. Kutcher's performance as an Indian named Raj was racist.

headline.main: Popchips Pulls Ashton Kutcher Ad Over Charges of Racism
